START:
🎭 Welcome to Anonymous Chat! 🎭

This app allows you to chat anonymously with random people from around the world. It's a great way to meet new friends, practice languages, or just have fun conversations!

🔍 /find - Find a chat partner
🛑 /stop - End the conversation
🚪 /exit - Leave the search queue
🏓 /ping - Check bot status
🖼️ /image - Request an image
🎞️ /gif - Request a GIF

Enjoy your anonymous chats! 😊

Invite friends to get unlimited access to images and GIFs!

HELP:
Here is how you can use the bot:

- 🔍 Find Chat: Start searching for a chat partner.
- 🛑 Stop: End your current chat.
- 🚪 Exit: Leave the queue or chat.
- ❓ Help: Get assistance with using the bot.
PING: 🏓 Pong! Bot is alive and kicking! Ready to connect you with chat partners.

CREATE_ROOM.SUCCESS_1:
🎉 Chat partner found! Happy chatting! Remember to be respectful and have fun!

Use the 'ℹ️ Partner Info' button to see information about your chat partner.

FIND.WARNING_1: ⚠️ You're already in the queue. Please be patient! We're working on finding you a great chat partner.
FIND.WARNING_2: ⚠️ You're already in a chat. Use /stop to end it first if you want to find a new partner.
FIND.LOADING: 🔎 Still searching for a partner... Please be patient! Good conversations are worth the wait!

NEXT.SUCCESS_1: 👋 You've left the conversation. Use /find to chat with someone new!
NEXT.SUCCESS_2: 👋 Your partner has ended the conversation. Feel free to /find another chat!
NEXT.WARNING_1:
⚠️ You don't have a chat partner.

🔍 Use /find to search for one and start a new conversation!

STOP.SUCCESS_1: 👋 You've left the conversation. Thanks for chatting! Hope you had a great time.
STOP.SUCCESS_2: 👋 Your partner has ended the conversation. We hope you enjoyed the chat!
STOP.SUCCESS_3: ✅ You've been removed from the queue. Feel free to use 🛑 Stop again when you're ready!
STOP.WARNING_1:
⚠️ You're not in a chat or queue.

🔍 Use 🔍 Find Chat to start searching and meet someone new!

EXIT.SUCCESS_1: ✅ Search cancelled. You're no longer in the queue. Ready to try again? Just use 🚪 Exit!
EXIT.WARNING_1: ⚠️ You're not in the queue or in a chat. Use 🚪 Exit when you're ready to start!

CONNECT.WARNING_1:
⚠️ You don't have a chat partner.
